description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期皇室宗室，著名的改革家、政治家、军事家、外交家和洋务派领袖。道光帝第六子，咸丰帝异母弟。曾任总理衙门首席大臣、领班军机大臣等要职，是同治朝及光绪朝前期朝廷的最高掌权者之一，也是洋务运动的主要发起者和领导者。
description.en: A prince of the Manchu Aisin Gioro clan and an important statesman during the late Qing dynasty. He was the sixth son of the Daoguang Emperor and the younger half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor. He served as the head of the Zongli Yamen and Grand Councilor, making him one of the most powerful figures during the Tongzhi and early Guangxu eras, as well as a primary initiator and leader of the Self-Strengthening Movement.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第八位皇帝，奕䜣的父亲。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty, father of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝的皇贵妃，奕䜣的生母，咸丰帝的养母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Daoguang Emperor, the birth mother of Yixin, and the adoptive mother of the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，奕䜣的异母兄。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty, Yixin's elder half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期中国的实际统治者。在辛酉政变中与奕䜣结盟，后成为其主要政治对手。
description.en: The de facto ruler of China in the late Qing dynasty. She allied with Yixin in the Xinyou Coup but later became his main political rival.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝的皇后，同治年间的两宫皇太后之一，是奕䜣的重要政治盟友。
description.en: Empress consort of the Xianfeng Emperor and one of the two empress dowagers during the Tongzhi era. She was an important political ally of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 一场由清朝政府部分官员倡导的，以“自强”、“求富”为口号，引进西方军事装备、科学技术以维护清朝统治的运动。奕䜣是其主要发起者和领导者。
description.en: A movement initiated by some officials of the Qing government, under the slogans of 'self-strengthening' and 'seeking wealth,' which aimed to introduce Western military equipment and technology to maintain Qing rule. Yixin was its primary initiator and leader.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期负责外交、通商、海关及其他涉外事务的中央机构，由奕䜣建议设立并长期领导。
description.en: The government body in charge of foreign policy in late Qing China, established and led by Yixin for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 1861年由奕䜣联合两宫皇太后发动的宫廷政变，推翻了咸丰帝遗命的顾命八大臣，夺取了政权。
description.en: A court coup in 1861 launched by Yixin in alliance with the two Empress Dowagers, overthrowing the eight regents appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor and seizing state power.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝临终前任命的辅佐同治帝的八位大臣，以载垣、端华、肃顺为首，在辛酉政变中被推翻。
description.en: A group of eight officials appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor on his deathbed to assist the young Tongzhi Emperor, led by Zaiyuan, Duanhua, and Sushun. They were overthrown in the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 顾命八大臣之首，在辛酉政变中被奕䜣等人定罪处死。
description.en: Leader of the Eight Regent Ministers, who was convicted and executed by Yixin and his allies during the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军对中国发动的侵略战争。战后奕䜣被委任主持议和，开启了其外交生涯。
description.en: A war of aggression launched by Britain and France against China. After the war, Yixin was appointed to lead the peace negotiations, which marked the beginning of his diplomatic career.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在第二次鸦片战争后与英国、法国、俄国分别签订的一系列不平等条约，由奕䜣代表清廷签署。
description.en: A series of unequal treaties signed between the Qing dynasty and Britain, France, and Russia after the Second Opium War, signed by Yixin on behalf of the Qing court.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期的一场大规模反清运动。在奕䜣掌权期间，清朝最终平定了这场运动。
description.en: A massive anti-Qing rebellion in the late Qing dynasty. During Yixin's time in power, the Qing dynasty finally suppressed this movement.

description.zh-cn: 1884年慈禧太后以中法战争失利为借口，罢免奕䜣所有职务并改组军机处的政治事件。
description.en: A political event in 1884 where Empress Dowager Cixi used the defeat in the Sino-French War as a pretext to dismiss Yixin from all his posts and reorganize the Grand Council.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪80年代清朝与法国之间因越南宗主权问题爆发的战争。慈禧太后利用此战争罢免了奕䜣。
description.en: A war in the 1880s between the Qing dynasty and France over suzerainty in Vietnam. Empress Dowager Cixi used this war to dismiss Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与日本之间为争夺朝鲜半岛控制权而爆发的战争。战时奕䜣被重新起用。
description.en: A war between the Qing dynasty and Japan over control of the Korean Peninsula. Yixin was recalled to service during the war.

description.zh-cn: 由光绪帝和维新派推动的一场短暂的政治改革运动，遭到以慈禧太后为首的保守派反对。晚年的奕䜣也对此极力抵制。
description.en: A brief political reform movement promoted by the Guangxu Emperor and reformists, opposed by conservatives led by Empress Dowager Cixi. The elderly Yixin also strongly resisted it.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，光绪帝的老师。曾与奕䜣一同在甲申易枢中被贬，但因反对洋务运动而与奕䜣政见不合。
description.en: A prominent official in the late Qing dynasty and tutor to the Guangxu Emperor. He was demoted along with Yixin in the Jiashen Purge, but his opposition to the Self-Strengthening Movement put him at odds with Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣长孙，第二代恭亲王。
description.en: Yixin's eldest grandson and the second Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣的嫡福晋，大学士桂良之女。
description.en: Yixin's primary consort, daughter of the Grand Secretary Guiliang.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，大学士，奕䜣的岳父。
description.en: A prominent official and Grand Secretary in the late Qing dynasty, and Yixin's father-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是道光帝的第六子。
description.en: Yixin was the sixth son of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是孝静成皇后的亲生儿子。
description.en: Yixin was the biological son of Empress Xiaojingcheng.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是咸丰帝的同父异母弟。
description.en: Yixin was the younger half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是奕䜣的嫡福晋（元配）。
description.en: Lady Gūwalgiya was Yixin's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是大学士桂良的庶女。
description.en: Lady Gūwalgiya was a daughter of Grand Secretary Guiliang by a concubine.

description.zh-cn: 溥伟是奕䜣的长孙，并承袭了其恭亲王爵位。
description.en: Puwei was Yixin's eldest grandson and inherited his title of Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝在英法联军进逼北京时北逃，命令奕䜣留京主持议和，这成为奕䜣进入权力中心、处理外交事务并积累政治资本的契机。
description.en: When Anglo-French forces advanced on Beijing, the Xianfeng Emperor fled north and ordered Yixin to remain and negotiate peace. This became Yixin's opportunity to enter the center of power, handle foreign affairs, and accumulate political capital.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次鸦片战争后，代表清朝与英、法、俄等国签订了《北京条约》。
description.en: After the Second Opium War, he signed the Convention of Peking with Britain, France, and Russia on behalf of the Qing court.

description.zh-cn: 联合慈禧太后和慈安太后发动“辛酉政变”，从顾命八大臣手中夺取了最高权力。
description.en: In alliance with Empress Dowagers Cixi and Ci'an, he launched the 'Xinyou Coup' to seize supreme power from the Eight Regent Ministers.

description.zh-cn: 政变推翻了咸丰帝遗命的辅政大臣，将其核心成员载垣、端华、肃顺等人捉拿定罪。
description.en: The coup overthrew the regents appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor's will, leading to the arrest and conviction of its key members, including Zaiyuan, Duanhua, and Sushun.

description.zh-cn: 作为辛酉政变的核心策划者之一，将顾命八大臣之首的肃顺等人捉拿并定罪。
description.en: As one of the key planners of the Xinyou Coup, he had Sushun, the leader of the Eight Regent Ministers, arrested and convicted.

description.zh-cn: 在辛酉政变期间及之后初期，奕䜣与慈禧太后结为政治盟友，共同执掌政权。
description.en: During and in the immediate aftermath of the Xinyou Coup, Yixin and Empress Dowager Cixi formed a political alliance and jointly held power.

description.zh-cn: 因奕䜣功高震主，逐渐遭到慈禧太后猜忌和打击，两人关系恶化，最终导致奕䜣在1884年被罢黜。
description.en: As Yixin's power and influence grew, he became an object of suspicion and suppression by Empress Dowager Cixi, leading to a deterioration in their relationship and culminating in Yixin's dismissal in 1884.

description.zh-cn: 在共同执政期间，慈安太后是奕䜣的重要政治支持者，帮助其制衡慈禧太后的权势。慈安太后去世后，奕䜣在朝中的地位开始动摇。
description.en: During their joint regency, Empress Dowager Ci'an was a key political supporter of Yixin, helping him to counterbalance the power of Empress Dowager Cixi. After Ci'an's death, Yixin's position at court began to weaken.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是洋务运动的代表人物、主要发起者及领袖，倡导并支持兴办近代军事工业和发展外交。
description.en: Yixin was a representative figure, primary initiator, and leader of the Self-Strengthening Movement, advocating for and supporting the establishment of modern military industries and the development of diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 采纳奕䜣的建议，清廷首次设立了专门的外交机构——总理各国事务衙门，并由其担任首任大臣。
description.en: Following Yixin's suggestion, the Qing court established the Zongli Yamen, its first dedicated foreign affairs office, with Yixin appointed as its first minister.

description.zh-cn: 在其掌权期间，积极调和斡旋，利用列强参与镇压，最终使清朝平息了太平天国运动。
description.en: During his time in power, he actively negotiated and maneuvered, using foreign powers to help suppress the Taiping Rebellion, which the Qing dynasty eventually quelled.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后以中法战争期间军机处指挥不力为由，发动了“甲申易枢”，罢免了奕䜣。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi used the Grand Council's poor command during the Sino-French War as a pretext to launch the 'Jiashen Purge' and dismiss Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 在甲申易枢事件中，奕䜣被罢免一切职务，令其居家养疾，正式退出权力核心。
description.en: In the Jiashen Purge, Yixin was dismissed from all his posts and ordered to recuperate at home, marking his formal exit from the core of power.

description.zh-cn: 由于甲午战争的危机形势，赋闲多年的奕䜣被慈禧太后再度起用。
description.en: Due to the crisis of the First Sino-Japanese War, Yixin, who had been in retirement for years, was recalled to service by Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 晚年对光绪帝意图发动的维新变法运动极力抵制、屡加阻挠。
description.en: In his later years, he strongly resisted and repeatedly obstructed the reform movement that the Guangxu Emperor intended to launch.

description.zh-cn: 因翁同龢反对洋务运动，奕䜣在病逝前向光绪帝表达了对其的反对意见，希望光绪帝不要被其迷惑。
description.en: Because Weng Tonghe opposed the Self-Strengthening Movement, Yixin, before his death, expressed his opposition to him to the Guangxu Emperor, hoping the emperor would not be misled by him.
